post.author: Brendan
post.content:
위니펙이라서 좀 올리기엔 그렇지만, 혹시라도해서... 보수는 좋군요. 어쩌면 이사 비용도 보태줄지??

*Internal Description:
Intermediate Java Developer
8 Months (with strong possiblity to extend)
Winnipeg
ERC SECURITY REQUIRED - We can process Enhanced Reliability Clearance for you at no charge.

*Must Have Skills:
Java Certification - (3-5Y)
Java Objects development - (2-3Y)
Spring - (1-2Y)
Hibernate - (1-2Y)
Struts - (1-2Y)
Eclipse - (1-2Y)
WSAD - (1-2Y)

*Role: Application Developer

Under the direction of the Lead Developer, the candidate will be responsible for the core activities of the software development effort for the OPS project. The Application Developer must:

- Follow coding standards where they exist and raise or assist in documenting deviations if required.
- Effectively interact and collaborate with the Lead Developer, DBA and other Developers on design interpretation and other development matters.
- As a developer work under the direction of the Lead Developer develop the application areas as assigned based on the agreed tools and standards.
- Develop quality SW as measured by defects during System, Integration and User Acceptance Test cycles.
- Perform unit testing to verify component functionality.
- Support the testers in their efforts and & correct problems as required.
- Collaborate and assist the Lead Developer & Project Manager with estimating, planning, workload balancing, tracking to schedule and as requested.
- Support the test team to resolve technical issues as required.


Skill Requirements :

Minimum 2 years experience in J2EE programming - must have Java certification and Federal Gov't Enhanced Reliability Clearance (ERC)
Experience programming object-oriented applications.
Experience using Spring, Hibernate, Struts.
Experience with Eclipse and WSAD development tools.
Experience in developing user interface design and prototyping.

*Additional Nice to Have : Experience building applications targeted to Oracle application server preferred.

Take care,

Melanie Sapishchuk
Resource Manager
msapishchuk@cncglobal.com

CNC Global Limited
177 Lombard Avenue, Suite 701
Winnipeg, Manitoba R3B 0W5
Tel: 204.942.1208
Fax: 204.957.0762
post.title: [Winnipeg] Java Developer - Contract, starting 8 mths
